title: Did Tom Selleck leave "blue blood " and offer some" final words "?
subtitle: The 11th season of Tom Selleck's TV series, led by CBS Blue Bloods, was shown later than usual because of the COVID-19 epidemic.
author: Jordan Liles
vclaim: Tom Selleck offered some final words before "leaving the stage forever" and would never again star on the TV program "Blue Blood."
